title: R.I.P masteries ;-;
body:
> The new masteries are good but dunno how to use em, still miss the old ones   {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
> You guys wanna help me fix my masteries? haha{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I had the same problem.

I think its really hard to make "generic" pages anymore. Your mastery pages have to be champion specific for the most part now I think. Which is a good change imo.
I dunno why I always get the biscuit as my potion XD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VDiGkPAtups

Maraudaur linked this video in another thread that Phreak made around the new masteries - it gives a pretty good rundown of the masteries and some good kicking off points for particular roles to build from
Oh yay :) thanks a lot, this will help my masteries :P
